atk_abil: Normal Attack: Fires several magic projectiles to damage and slow enemy.
Skill Attack: Increases speed and attack range of nearby friendly units, heals them for 5%, gives immunity to knockback and blow for a period of time.
Special Ability 1: Increases basic game speed by 5%, and increases the critical attack damage and the movement speed of Elf units by 5%.
Special Ability 2: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000
Senior Instructor (Elf) : Increases the production speed of Elf guild unit by 7% per 5-star unit, 15% per 6-star unit. Applies in Time Shop, but can not exceed 150%.

World Tree Blessing : Drawing from the World Tree Energy, increases the number of stages skipped by Elf Secret and Legend of Ancient Forest by 1. World Tree Energy increases by 15 for every 5-star, 30 for every 6-star unit. (Applies in Time Shop, High Fairys World Tree Energy cannot exceed 900).
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Fires several magic projectiles to damage and slow enemy.
Skill Attack: Increases speed and attack range of nearby friendly units, heals them for 10%, gives immunity to knockback and blow for a period of time.
Special Ability 1: Increases basic game speed by 10%, and increases the critical attack damage and the movement speed of Elf units by 7%.
Special Ability 2: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000
Senior Instructor (Elf) : Increases the production speed of Elf guild unit by 7% per 5-star unit, 15% per 6-star unit. Applies in Time Shop, but can not exceed 150%.

World Tree Blessing : Drawing from the World Tree Energy, increases the number of stages skipped by Elf Secret and Legend of Ancient Forest by 1. World Tree Energy increases by 15 for every 5-star, 30 for every 6-star unit. (Applies in Time Shop, High Fairys World Tree Energy cannot exceed 900).
